nodes.text: Amazing Heroes 13 was the thirteenth issue of the comic book fan magazine, Amazing Heroes, released in July 1982.

The issue featured an article about the history of Star Wars in the comics and comic strips, with excerpts from interviews of comic strip writer Archie Goodwin and then-current Marvel series writer, David Michelinie. Michelinie discusses the challenge of writing between movies without knowing what would happen in the upcoming "Revenge" of the Jedi.
The issue also included the first installment of a reprint of The Serpent Masters comic strip story, a Star Wars cover by Kevin Nowlan, and other non-Star Wars content.
